original:
At the conclusion of the second year of clinical pathology residency, residents have the option to pursue either general clinical pathology or a specialization in one of its disciplines. However, it is important to note that residents specializing in anatomical pathology are not permitted to practice clinical pathology, nor can clinical pathology residents engage in anatomical pathology.
